definition: to have a highly retentive memory/to have sth imprinted in one's memory
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: You bet it is, but the contrast between the beautiful photography and dog poop is remarkable.
sentences.chinese: 不過美景和狗屎相映成趣倒是讓人過目不忘。

sentences.english: My friend has many talents; one of them is never forgetting a face.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友有很多才能，其中一項就是過目不忘。

sentences.english: Seven sister figure let him never forgets anything, deeply engraved on his mind.
sentences.chinese: 七妹的身影讓他過目不忘，深深得刻在他的心目中。

sentences.english: I had a very good memory for figures.
sentences.chinese: 我對數字算是過目不忘吧。

definition: to click one's tongue in wonder (idiom)/to be astonished
lit. slap the table and shout with praise (idiom); fig. wonderful!/amazing!/great!
cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
lit. not a common chord (idiom); outstanding/brilliant/out of the common run
to touch base matter and turn it to gold (idiom); fig. to turn crude writing into a literary gem
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
